1512760.name: Senior Physical Test VR
1512760.description:
Senior Physical Test VR


This application is intended for balanced testing of the sineer and works in an HTC VIVE PRO environment.
You can get information through the tutorial first, and then proceed with the tests in order.
After completing all the tests, enjoy the functional mini game based on the results.
For your information, the movement of the legs is important as it is a balanced test, so you must attach the tracker to the legs before playing.
The dialogue and audio of the content is made up of Hangeul, and it is meaningful to test the physical ability, not to show the purpose of the treatment.
1512760.supported_languages:
韩语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
